title: #228 - Godfrey & ME
description:
Comedian Godfrey Danchimah & ME sit in the Mancave and talk about his run in’s with Dave Chapelle, Mike Epps, Greer Barnes, Tony Woods, Bernie Mac, & racism in the entertainment business.

 

To get my book “Life of the Party” click HERE: https://www.amazon.com/Life-Party-Stories-Perpetual-Man-Child/dp/1250030250

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
